official-title.#text:
To direct the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to establish a program allowing low
			 volume motor vehicle manufacturers to produce a limited number of vehicles
			 annually within a regulatory system that addresses the unique safety and
			 financial issues associated with limited production, and to direct the
			 Environmental Protection Agency to allow low volume motor vehicle
			 manufacturers to install engines from vehicles that have been issued
			 certificates of conformity.
